title: A New Face To Watch Out For
teaser: Gina Rodriguez, the star of the CW's new show, "Jane The Virgin," has critics buzzing.
contentencoded:
A new show called “Jane The Virgin” premiers tonight on the CW Network.

It’s about a young Latina woman trying to stay chaste, to avoid the mistakes her mother has made in life. The actress who plays Jane is Gina Rodriguez, and she is receiving a lot of buzz.

NPR TV critic Eric Deggans joins Here & Now’s Peter O’Dowd to talk about the show.

Guest

  • Eric Deggans, TV critic for NPR. He tweets @Deggans.
